document_data.name: Spirali
document_data.mainbody: '''Spirali''' was a [[Maztican]] [[drow]]. He was one of the [[Ancient Ones]].
document_data.History:
In [[1361 DR]], a prophecy indicated that a young girl, [[Erixitl]], would be the doom of the Ancient Ones. So Spirali was sent to find and kill her, while leading a pack of [[hell hound]]s.

At last, he found her in [[Payit]] but before Spirali could kill her, the drow and his hell hounds were killed by [[Halloran]] of the [[Golden Legion]] and the [[Eagle Knights (Maztica)|Eagle Knight]] [[Poshtli]].
